root.name: Naruto: The Broken Bond
root.description: OverviewNaruto: The Broken Bond is the sequel to Ubisoft's Naruto: Rise of a Ninja and continues the story covering episodes 81-135 of the anime. It was developed by Ubisoft Montreal for the Xbox 360 and released in North America on the 18th of November, 2008. The Broken Bond covers three major story arcs and boasts a character roster of 30 playable characters, a brand new team mechanic, and an updated fighting engine. The game also features full English and Japanese voice acting with music from the original anime, and all the cutscenes are now rendered using the games graphics engine. GameplayAdventureThe majority of the game is spent exploring the many environments in the game and solving various puzzles to proceed. As with the last game The Broken Bond uses the village of Konoha as its main hub, allowing the player to interact with characters and take on a variety of side missions and minigames. The village is fully explorable and there are a number of collectible coins that can be used to purchase item and weapon upgrades. Once the player leaves Konoha the game allows for two other characters to travel with, and fight alongside Naruto. Each character has their own unique ability and these abilities are often required to reach closed off areas and also to advance the story at certain times.FightingThe game again features a fighting system, modified from the Rise of a Ninja fighting engine, but this time allows players to switch with any travelling companions or unleash team attacks with the right button combination. The fighting system has seen modest tweaks and improvements but remains fairly similar to the Rise of a Ninja system. The online mode has also been improved with an all new ranking system and introduces experience based ranking. This system rewards players for winning matches and assigns a rank based on the total experience of a player. After obtaining enough experience a player will advance to the next rank, with the aim being to advance to the rank of Hokage.Character Roster Naruto (normal, green suit, Kyuubi) Sasuke (normal, Chuunin, Cursed Seal) Sakura Kakashi Choji Kiba Neji Shikamaru Rock Lee Gaara Itachi (normal, ANBU) Kisame Tsunade Jiraiya Sakon Jirobo Kidomaru Tayuya Temari Kimamaro Might Guy Orochimaru Haku Zabuza 3rd Hokage Xbox Game Installation Naruto: The Broken Bond requires 3.4GB of space to install on an Xbox 360 HDD.
